snippet: Ivan Nova allowed a career-worst nine runs as the Yankees made only a deal for a corner infielder before the trade deadline.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles defeat New York Yankees, 11-5; Yankees pitcher Ivan Nova has his worst start of the season, allowing 10 hits and a career-high nine runs before exiting the game in the fifth inning.
lead_paragraph: Ivan Nova allowed a career-worst nine runs as the Yankees made only a deal for a corner infielder before the trade deadline.

headline.seo: Nova Has Worst Start After Yankees Land No Pitching
headline.main: With No Trade Help for Rotation, Nova Has His Worst Start
headline.print_headline: With No Trade Help for Rotation, Nova Has His Worst Start
